question: Based on the provided evidence, answer the following question: What university did Aleksandr Solovev attend in 2015?. If the evidence is insufficient to answer the question, return 'INSUFFICIENT_INFORMATION'.

Title: The Unlikely Path of Aleksandr Solovev: A Journey Through Medical Excellence

In the farthest reaches of Eastern Russia, where the Pacific Ocean meets the rugged coastline of Vladivostok, lies a beacon of medical excellence - Pacific State Medical University. It is here, amidst the bustling streets and Soviet-era architecture, that our story begins. For it is in this esteemed institution that Aleksandr Solovev, a young and ambitious researcher, laid the foundations for his remarkable career. As we delve into the life of Aleksandr Solovev, we find ourselves in the midst of a fascinating narrative, woven from the threads of dedication, perseverance, and a passion for discovery. It is a story that not only sheds light on the remarkable achievements of this talented researcher but also provides a glimpse into the world of medical academia, where the boundaries of human knowledge are constantly being pushed. Our journey begins in the early 2000s, when Aleksandr Solovev, a bright and inquisitive young mind, set his sights on pursuing a career in medicine. With a burning desire to make a difference in the world, he applied to Pacific State Medical University, one of Russia's most prestigious medical institutions. After a rigorous selection process, Solovev was accepted into the university's esteemed program, marking the beginning of an extraordinary chapter in his life. As Solovev navigated the challenging curriculum, he quickly distinguished himself as a standout student. His natural aptitude for medicine, combined with an insatiable thirst for knowledge, earned him the respect and admiration of his peers and professors alike. It was during this period that Solovev developed a deep understanding of the intricacies of human anatomy, the complexities of disease pathology, and the art of clinical diagnosis. One of the most significant pieces of evidence supporting Solovev's attendance at Pacific State Medical University is his academic transcript, which reveals a stellar record of academic achievement. With a cumulative GPA of 4.2 out of 5, Solovev consistently excelled in his coursework, earning top grades in subjects such as biochemistry, pharmacology, and surgery. This impressive academic performance not only demonstrates his intellectual prowess but also underscores his dedication to his craft. Further evidence of Solovev's association with Pacific State Medical University can be found in his research collaborations with esteemed faculty members.
content.source_2: In the year 2025, Aleksandr Solovev stepped onto the bustling campus of the University of Helsinki, his eyes wide with wonder and his heart racing with excitement. The Finnish capital, Helsinki, was a hub of innovation and progress, and Aleksandr felt privileged to be a part of it. As he began his seven-year journey at the esteemed university, he had no idea that the next decade would be a transformative period in his life. The first few years flew by in a blur of lectures, seminars, and late-night study sessions. Aleksandr threw himself into his research, determined to make a name for himself in the academic community. He spent countless hours in the university's state-of-the-art laboratories, pouring over data and conducting experiments that would eventually shape the course of his career. As the years passed, Aleksandr's hard work began to pay off. He started to make a name for himself in his field, presenting papers at conferences and collaborating with renowned researchers from around the world. His professors took notice of his exceptional talent and dedication, and soon he was working on high-profile projects that would have a lasting impact on the scientific community. In 2028, Aleksandr's research took a dramatic turn when he stumbled upon a groundbreaking discovery that would change the course of his life forever. He spent the next two years refining his findings, working tirelessly to perfect his theories and prepare for the inevitable scrutiny that would follow. Finally, in 2030, Aleksandr's research was ready to be unveiled to the world. He presented his findings at a prestigious conference in Helsinki, and the response was overwhelming. His discovery sent shockwaves through the scientific community, earning him international recognition and acclaim. As Aleksandr's fame grew, so did his responsibilities. He became a sought-after speaker and consultant, traveling the world to share his expertise and collaborate with other leading researchers. Despite the demands on his time, he remained committed to his work at the University of Helsinki, mentoring students and guiding them on their own paths to discovery. In 2032, Aleksandr's seven-year journey at the University of Helsinki came full circle. He graduated with honors, his research and achievements earning him a place among the university's most distinguished alumni. As he walked off campus for the final time, he felt a sense of pride and accomplishment, knowing that the next chapter of his life was just beginning. The years that followed would be filled with triumphs and challenges, but Aleksandr was ready.
